short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alters TCPro station page to render saved formatting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tweaks how the barcode scanning stations of Total Control Pro display instructions.  The screenshot shows before (left) and after (right).  It also pushes the instructions down below the other, more important areas like stage notes and item tracking.
